data.eml:eml: SNH Invertebrate Site Condition Monitoring 2013/14: Earlshall Muir SSSI

This dataset was gathered as part of a Scottish Natural Heritage contract in 2013/14. It provides the results of invertebrate surveys designed to inform Site Condition Monitoring at Earlshall Muir SSSI. These surveys targeted the notified beetle assemblage feature (Arena tabida and Pissodes validirostris), but other invertebrate taxa were also recorded.
